已过时的 API

目录

  • 已过时的方法
  • 已过时的方法 
    方法和说明
    androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.findViewHolderForPosition(int)
    use RecyclerView.findViewHolderForLayoutPosition(int) or RecyclerView.findViewHolderForAdapterPosition(int)
    androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.LayoutManager.getChildMeasureSpec(int, int, int, boolean)
    use RecyclerView.LayoutManager.getChildMeasureSpec(int, int, int, int, boolean)
    androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.getChildPosition(View)
    use RecyclerView.getChildAdapterPosition(View) or RecyclerView.getChildLayoutPosition(View).
    androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.ItemDecoration.getItemOffsets(Rect, int, RecyclerView)
    Use #getItemOffsets(Rect, View, RecyclerView, State)
    androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder.getPosition()
    This method is deprecated because its meaning is ambiguous due to the async handling of adapter updates. You should use getLayoutPosition() or getAdapterPosition() depending on your use case.
    androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.LayoutParams.getViewPosition()
    use RecyclerView.LayoutParams.getViewLayoutPosition() or RecyclerView.LayoutParams.getViewAdapterPosition()
    androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.SmoothScroller.instantScrollToPosition(int)
    Use RecyclerView.SmoothScroller.Action.jumpTo(int).
    androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.isLayoutFrozen()
    Use RecyclerView.isLayoutSuppressed().
    androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.LayoutManager.onDetachedFromWindow(RecyclerView)
    override #onDetachedFromWindow(RecyclerView, Recycler)
    androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.ItemDecoration.onDraw(Canvas, RecyclerView)
    Override RecyclerView.ItemDecoration.onDraw(Canvas, RecyclerView, RecyclerView.State)
    androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.ItemDecoration.onDrawOver(Canvas, RecyclerView)
    Override RecyclerView.ItemDecoration.onDrawOver(Canvas, RecyclerView, RecyclerView.State)
    androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.LayoutManager.onRequestChildFocus(RecyclerView, View, View)
    Use #onRequestChildFocus(RecyclerView, State, View, View)
    androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.LayoutManager.setAutoMeasureEnabled(boolean)
    Implementors of LayoutManager should define whether or not it uses AutoMeasure by overriding RecyclerView.LayoutManager.isAutoMeasureEnabled().
    androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.setLayoutFrozen(boolean)
    Use RecyclerView.suppressLayout(boolean).
    androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.setLayoutTransition(LayoutTransition)
    Use RecyclerView.setItemAnimator(ItemAnimator) ()}.
    androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.setOnScrollListener(RecyclerView.OnScrollListener)
    Use RecyclerView.addOnScrollListener(OnScrollListener) and RecyclerView.removeOnScrollListener(OnScrollListener)
